operations.document: mutation GetApiAccessToken($clientId:String!,$secret:String!){getApiAccessToken(clientId:$clientId,secret:$secret){__typename access_token expires_in refresh_token scope token_type}}

mutation UnlinkServiceMutation($accountNum:String!,$comment:String!){unlinkService(accountNum:$accountNum,comment:$comment){__typename currentServices{__typename accountNum dateAdded name}unlinkedDatetime{Sec __typename date hour min month year}}}

query FindAllQuery($limit:Int!,$offset:Int!){findAll(limit:$limit,offset:$offset){__typename accountDetail{__typename personaInfo{__typename accountNum answer birthday email firstName lastName mobileNumber nic securityQuestion username}services{__typename accountNum name}}totalItems}}

query GetAccountDetailQuery($userTicket:String!){getAccountDetail(userTicket:$userTicket){__typename personaInfo{__typename accountNum birthday email firstName lastName mobileNumber nic username}services{__typename accountNum name}}}

query GetUserServicesByUsername($username:String!){getUserServicesByUsername(username:$username){__typename services{__typename accountNum name}user{__typename accountNum answer birthday email firstName lastName mobileNumber nic securityQuestion username}}}

query GetUserServicesHistoryByUsernameQuery($username:String!){getUserServicesHistoryByUsername(username:$username){__typename servicesHistory{__typename account_number comment date id service_action service_id service_status service_type user_id}user{__typename accountNum answer birthday email firstName lastName mobileNumber nic securityQuestion username}}}

query SearchUsersByCategories($email:String,$firstName:String,$limit:Int!,$msisdn:String,$nic:String,$offset:Int!,$username:String){searchUsersByCategories(email:$email,firstName:$firstName,limit:$limit,msisdn:$msisdn,nic:$nic,offset:$offset,username:$username){__typename accountDetail{__typename personaInfo{__typename accountNum answer birthday email firstName lastName mobileNumber nic securityQuestion username}services{__typename accountNum name}}totalItems}}
